thread.title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil can't go AWOL vs Bayern Munich | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil can't go AWOL vs Bayern Munich | Daily Mail Online

author: Kieran Gill For Mailonline
title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil can't go AWOL vs Bayern Munich | Daily Mail Online
text: Arsenal news: All the latest from the Emirates Mesut Ozil is under more scrutiny than ever as Arsenal take on Bayern Munich Wednesday night’s tie sees Ozil go to an arena full of fans who aren’t fond of him There was talk of Arsene Wenger dropping his record signing due to poor form The German playmaker has built a reputation for going AWOL in big matches Ozil was anonymous against Chelsea as Arsenal succumbed to a 2-0 defeat
